title: ARAM selected Champion unowned and not in free-rotation
body: I played an ARAM game, I was selected Janna. However, I don't own Janna and she is also not in the free-rotation this week. Has anyone experience this before? Is it supposed to roll a champion I own or in free rotation?

replies.body: While Janna is not in *this* weeks free rotation, she is in the free rotation from 2 weeks ago, and since ARAM uses the 3 most recent free rotations (rather than *just* the current week's) it makes sense for Janna to be a possible pick.
Got it, thank you for the reply
